# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #91](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#91)

#### Lightflame

Do all Shards have some sort of Shard-induced weakness, like how Ruin and Preservation can't see metal?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes
